newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH '96 MACHINERY OUTPUT UP 5-10 PCT - MINISTRY.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH '96 MACHINERY OUTPUT UP 5-10 PCT - MINISTRY.

text.p: The output volume of Finnish machinery and equipment production is expected to rise five to ten percent in 1996 on 1995, the Ministry of Trade and Industry said in a statement on Thursday.

"There are strong indications that the percentage rise will remain below ten. Growth is likely to be some five percent, unless there is a spurt in the last months of the year," the ministry said referring to its sector report.
"Cyclical barometres as well as estimates by economic research institutes have turned more favourable during the latter half of this year," it added.
The gross value of machinery and equipment production rose 24 percent in 1995 to 37.4 billion markka, the ministry said.
